Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute near Desplaines/Fulton
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses temp. rerouted NB Jefferson, Fulton, Halsted and Milwaukee; SB Milwaukee, Kinzie, Clinton, Fulton and Desplaines near Desplaines/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Desplaines/Fulton due to street blockage near Desplaines/Fulton.

Northbound buses will operate via Jefferson, Fulton, Halsted and Milwaukee.

Southbound buses will operate via Milwaukee, Kinzie, Clinton, Fulton and Desplaines.

Allow extra travel time.
